code: const CardModalReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{visible:false,isEditable:false,name:"",imgURL:"",description:"",_id:""};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;let buddy;let modal;let newState;switch(action.type){case"UPDATE_CARD_MODAL":modal=action.payload;newState={...state};newState.name=modal.name;newState.description=modal.description;return newState;case"SHOW_CARD_MODAL":newState={...state};newState.visible=true;return newState;case"CLOSE_CARD_MODAL":newState={...state};newState.visible=false;return newState;case"SWITCH_MODAL_MODE":newState={...state};newState.isEditable=!state.isEditable;return newState;case"SET_CARD_MODAL":buddy=action.payload;newState={...state};newState.visible=true;newState.isEditable=false;newState.name=buddy.name;newState.imgURL=buddy.imgURL;newState.description=buddy.description;newState._id=buddy._id;return newState;default:return state;}};export default CardModalReducer;
